data.title: The Simpsons? Family Guy? This is Delaware's favorite animated sitcom
data.meta_description: All Home Connections has rounded up a list of the country's favorite animated sitcoms. In Delaware, this sitcom is king.
data.text:
In honor of The Simpsons heading into their 30th season, the Data Team at All Home Connections, via AT&T, decided on taking a look at what animated sitcoms each state in the U.S. can't seem to get enough of.

The group says its analysts started with a list of the top 15 most popular animated sitcoms. From there, analysts used Google Trends to find the shows with the highest search volume in each state. Then, they compared the results.

At the top of Delaware's list is Family Guy, which is set to kick off its 17th season Sunday, Sept. 30.

South Park was Delaware's second favorite show, in addition to being the second favorite show nationwide.

South Park is Pennsylvania's favorite, while in Maryland, The Simpsons holds the top spot.

Entering its 30th season means The Simpsons is officially the longest running primetime scripted series in the U.S.

Diverging from the pack is Washington D.C., whose favorite animated sitcom is the MTV classic Daria.

Here is the full list of each state's favorite animated sitcom:

Alabama: Robot Chicken

Alaska: Futurama

Arizona: The Simpsons

Arkansas: American Dad!

California: The Simpsons

Colorado: South Park

Connecticut: Family Guy

Delaware: Family Guy

District of Columbia: Daria

Florida: The Simpsons

Georgia: American Dad!

Hawaii: Rick and Morty

Idaho:Rick and Morty

Illinois: Archer

Indiana:Family Guy

Iowa: The Simpsons

Kansas: American Dad!

Kentucky: King of the Hill

Louisiana: American Dad!

Maine: Archer

Maryland: The Simpsons

Massachusetts: The Simpsons

Michigan: The Simpsons

Minnesota: The Simpsons

Mississippi: American Dad!

Missouri: The Simpsons

Montana: Archer

Nebraska: The Simpsons

Nevada: South Park

New Hampshire: Family Guy

New Jersey: The Simpsons

New Mexico: Bobâ€™s Burgers

New York: Daria

North Carolina: South Park

North Dakota: Family Guy

Ohio: South Park

Oklahoma: American Dad!

Oregon: The Simpsons

Pennsylvania: South Park

Rhode Island: Family Guy

South Carolina: Robot Chicken

South Dakota: Family Guy

Tennessee: King of the Hill

Texas: The Simpsons

Utah: The Boondocks

Vermont: South Park

Virginia: The Simpsons

Washington: South Park

West Virginia: South Park

Wisconsin: The Simpsons

Wyoming: Archer
